org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.management

Class AddressDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.management.AddressDefinition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EndpointDefinition.Address

    public class AddressDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    The address definition which can be added to endpoints to define addresses of an endpoint by the programmable API of the ESB
    Since:
    2.1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AddressDefinition.Type
      Defined address types

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddressDefinition(java.lang.String value)
      Constructs an address definition of type AddressDefinition.Type.URL with the given url
      AddressDefinition(java.lang.String id, AddressDefinition.Type type, java.lang.String value)
      Constructs and address definition of the given type with the given identifier and value
      AddressDefinition(java.lang.String id, AddressDefinition.Type type, java.lang.String value, double weight)
      Constructs and address definition of the given type with the given identifier and value for the given weight
      AddressDefinition(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String value)
      Constructs an address definition of type AddressDefinition.Type.URL with the given url and identifier

      • AddressDefinition

        public AddressDefinition(java.lang.String id,
                 AddressDefinition.Type type,
                 java.lang.String value)
        Constructs and address definition of the given type with the given identifier and value
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the address
        type - the type of the address
        value - the value of the address, which is either a complete url or a url prefix

      • AddressDefinition

        public AddressDefinition(java.lang.String id,
                 AddressDefinition.Type type,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 double weight)
        Constructs and address definition of the given type with the given identifier and value for the given weight
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the address
        type - the type of the address
        value - the value of the address, which is either a complete url or a url prefix
        weight - the weight of the address
